Plot: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.
Title: ParaNorman
Actors: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Tucker Albrizzi, Anna Kendrick, Casey Affleck
tomatoConsensus: Beautifully animated and solidly scripted, ParaNorman will entertain (and frighten) older children while providing surprisingly thoughtful fare for their parents.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 19 wins & 43 nominations.
